title: Sony Japan Global Hiring 2025
author: 글로벌리더십센터 최여진
content:
Greetings from the Global Talent Acquisition Team at Sony HQ in Tokyo!
We are excited to announce that we are hiring STEM undergraduate and graduate (Master’s and PhD) students who can join in 2025.

Sony Japan welcome all interested students to join us in our upcoming event.
 ■Information Session Event Outline (Hosted by the Global Talent Acquisition Team)
- Sony Company Introduction, Working at Sony Japan
- Insight into the Intern/Full-Time Employee Experience
- Moving, Visa, & Travel Support for Interns/Full-Time Employees
- Application Timeline & Submission Tips
 Please join the event and feel free to ask any questions during Q&A session!
 [Event Date and Registration URL]
Date and Time : May 31st (Fri) 7:00 PM – 8:00 PM JST
Registration URL: https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_wVGmGfo0RmiWgg-nfTjGQw#/registration
 A varieties of job positions (internship and full time) are available!
Please see details through Sony Global Careers Website and apply to the positions!
https://www.sony.com/en/SonyInfo/Careers/japan/
 We are looking forward to meeting you at our online event on May 31st!
